Methods

add_utf8_bom   add_utf8_bom!   check_bom   check_utf8_encoding   remove_utf8_bom   remove_utf8_bom!  

Public Instance methods

add_utf8_bom()

add_utf8_bom returns a copy of self with an added utf-8-BOM, if the encoding is utf-8. Otherwise an unmodified copy of self will be returned.

The String object self must be a well-formed utf-8 encoded String object.

add_utf8_bom!()

add_utf8_bom! returns self with an added utf-8-BOM, if the encoding is utf-8. Otherwise nil will be returned.

The String object self must be a well-formed utf-8 encoded String object.

check_bom()

Tests the first bytes of a String object for the occurence of one of the Unicode Byte Order Marks (BOM).

check_bom has the following return values:

nil:no BOM recognized
‘utf-8’:UTF-8 BOM recognized
‘utf-16le’:UTF-16LE BOM recognized
‘utf-16be’:UTF-16BE BOM recognized
‘utf-32le’:UTF-32LE BOM recognized (or UTF-16LE with 0x0000 after BOM)
‘utf-32be’:UTF-32BE BOM recognized
check_utf8_encoding()

check_utf8_encoding checks self completely on basis of the identical Tables Table 3-7. Well-Formed UTF-8 Byte Sequences (Unicode 5.0), or Table 3-6. Well-Formed UTF-8 Byte Sequences (Unicode 4.0).

The method returns nil if the encoding of self isn‘t utf-8 or if the contents of self doesn‘t follow the rules described in the Unicode tables.

If the check succeeds, the number of recognized utf-8 characters (Unicode codepoints) will be returned (this may include a BOM if present).

remove_utf8_bom()

remove_utf8_bom returns a copy of self without a leading utf-8-BOM, if the encoding is utf-8 and self starts with an utf-8-BOM. Otherwise a copy of self will be returned.

The String object self must be a well-formed utf-8 encoded String object.

remove_utf8_bom!()

remove_utf8_bom! removes a leading _utf-8-BOM_ from self, if the encoding is utf-8 and self starts with an utf-8-BOM.

If an utf-8-BOM was removed, it is the return value. Otherwise nil will be returned.

The String object self must be a well-formed utf-8 encoded String object.
